Hotel Everest (071-520317), on Bank Rd, has good, clean, modern rooms for NRs. 600/800. They often give a discount.

Hotel Shambala (071- 21837, 071-520167), Bank Rd, has rooms with common bath for NRs. 350, with private bath for NRs. 450/550, and with air-coolers and hot water for NRs. 1200/1400. Restaurant serves South Asian and Chinese food. One of the few restaurants serving ice cream in the hot summer.

Hotel Lumbini Pagoda (071 -521837), just beside the new Bus Park and half a km south of Bank Street has a very nice garden with rooms starting at 400 NRs. Nice restaurant and serves in the garden as well.
